channel.title: Primal-X | 718/742 | ECO | PvP | PvP | Skilling | Staff Spots Open
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/4_headertexts2_zpsa78f948c.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Website: [URL=http://"http://primal-x.com"]Here[/URL]
Downloadable Client: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/i3dzvxomk1r63m5/Primal-X.jar"]Here[/URL][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=4]What We Aim For[/SIZE][/CENTER] [CENTER]What we aim for at Primal-X is a stable and enjoyable server for people to go on. I always enjoyed playing with other RSPS fanatics and just having a good time. At Primal-X we offer a variety of playing types. If you are into PvM we have all RS bosses plus some custom ones giving a nice little loot bonus. For Skillers we offer all skills trainable. If you are into PvP we offer all Wilderness areas crucible and much more. So please be sure to come join Primal-X![/CENTER]
[B]New Features[/B]
- Drygore - Dominion Wepons - Clue Scrolls/Rewards Same as RS - Fixed Sprites! (Squeal, No-null mapdata) - Disk of returning (world rare drop) - MO Shops - God Spells - Vote4Rewards - PvM Credits/Shop - Pk Box - Fixed Squeal of Fortune - Artisian Workshop - Zombie Minigame - Fight Kiln - New or Old Item Looks, You Decide! (::Switchitemslook) - Makeover Mage - Brand New Shops - Nex 100% - Queen Black Dragon. COMPLETE 100% - New King Black Dragon Added - New Godwar Items Such as the Armadyl Buckler etc Have Been Added with Real Bonuses!
[B]Minigames[/B]
- Clue Scrolls - Dominion Tower - Fight Caves - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Clan Wars - Castle Wars - Fight Pits
[B]Boss Teleports[/B]
- Bandos - Armadyl - Saradomin - Zamorak - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - Nex - Tormented Demons - Corporal Beast - Kalphite Queen - More to come soon!
[B]Training Teleports[/B]
- Rock Crabs! - Grater Demons! - Black Demons! - Green Dragons! - Or where ever you prefer
[B]Skilling Teleports[/B]
- Fishing - Mining - Agility - Woodcutting - Runecrafting - Hunter - LRC - Artisian Workshop - More to come soon!
[B]Pking Teleports[/B]
- Mage Bank - Revenants - Edgeville - Easts - Wests
[B]Slayer Dungeons[/B]
- Kuradals Dungeon! - Jadinko Lair! - Polypore Dungeon! - Slayer Tower! - Glacors!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/4_zps9d704362.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/5_zpsef26e147.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/3_zps510e616a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/2_zps1d45f1a7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/1_zps0ca8c765.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/ScreenShot2013-09-01at90042AM_zps69257043.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/ScreenShot2013-08-31at31840PM_zpsfb2eabb6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb432/jecybuski4/ScreenShot2013-08-31at31943PM_zps4aeeaca6.png[/img] [/CENTER]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=4]What We Aim For[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]What we aim for at Primal-X is a stable and enjoyable server for people to go on. I always enjoyed playing with other RSPS fanatics and just having a good time. At Primal-X we offer a variety of playing types. If you are into PvM we have all RS bosses plus some custom ones giving a nice little loot bonus. For Skillers we offer all skills trainable. If you are into PvP we offer all Wilderness areas crucible and much more. So please be sure to come join Primal-X![/CENTER]

New Features

  • Drygore
  • Dominion Wepons
  • Clue Scrolls/Rewards Same as RS
  • Fixed Sprites! (Squeal, No-null mapdata)
  • Disk of returning (world rare drop)
